styles.livee: display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 600px; margin: 8px auto; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 6px;
styles.liveeLink: display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; background-color: red; color: white; font-weight: bold; padding: 8px; border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0; text-decoration: none; gap: 8px;
styles.liveeNote: background-color: white; color: black; font-size: 14px; padding: 6px 8px; text-align: center; border-radius: 0 0 6px 6px; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-top: none;
